overview:
Kyoko Watanabe is the Director of Finance Operations for DEFTA Partners. Since 1995, Ms. Watanabe has managed all financial, operational and investor relations aspects of funds for the company.

Prior to joining DEFTA, Ms. Watanabe worked for Go Corporation, a pen-based computing start-up company, in the Japanese product development group.

Ms. Watanabe is also the Director of the Alliance Forum, an organization that links emerging U.S. technology growth companies with established Japanese companies in the Information Technology industry.

via: DEFTA
